FuncDef: The display bgp vpn-target update-peer-group command displays information about update peer-groups in the BGP-VPN-Target address family. The display bgp vpn-target update-peer-group command displays information about update peer-groups in the BGP-VPN-Target address family.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the index of an update peer-group.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 65535.

ExtraInfo: Details about update peer-groups can be displayed based on the update peer-group index.
